cells.content:
// Create a hash and store nested key-value pairs
HSET company name 'ST Engineering' age 1965 industry defence revenue 5.3

// get a single field from a hash
HGET company name

// get all key-value pair in hash
HGETALL company

// Does the key exist in the hash? Returns '1' if it exists, '0' if not
HEXISTS company revenue

// Deletes the hash stored at a key
DEL company

// Deletes a single key-value pair stored in a hash
HDEL company industry

// Adds a value to a number stored in a hash. 
HINCRBY company age 10

// Sets the key to the 'add' value if the key isn't defined already
HINCRBY company profit 1000

// Gets the length of a string stored in a hash. Returns 0 if not string is set
HSTRLEN company name

// Get all the keys of a hash
HKEYS company

// Get all the values of a hash
HVALS company
